title: Tiny-Verse
description:
➢ Made this for WTF x IGDC game jam 2024 and the theme was “Small World, Big Adventure”.
➢ Created dynamic 3D environment, enemy AI, aim and shoot system, audio system, animation and engaging game mechanics to improve gameplay.
➢ Utilized singleton pattern, oops, coroutine for implementation.

title: Snake-2D
description:
➢ Retro snake game with 4 unique levels with one boss level and added different boosters.
➢ Implemented the Service locator design pattern to manage game services, enhancing modularity and scalablity.
➢ Used MVC pattern for creating snake and levels.

title: Endless-Waves
description:
➢ Made this for a game jam hosted by GameDev.tv and the theme was “Last stand”.
➢ Implemented enemy AI, aim and shoot system, high score save system, audio system and setup difficultycurve as per time passes.
➢ Also added animations, blood particle system with interactive UI

title: Minesweeper
description:
➢ Developed a Minesweeper game with traditional mechanics and scalable design.
➢ Implemented the Service Locator design pattern for efficient resource management.
➢ Applied MVC architecture to separate game logic, UI, and data handling.

title: Skip-The Lights
description:
➢ A endless runner game.
➢ Implemented a dynamic background parallax system to enhance visual depth and user experience.
➢ Utilized singleton pattern, oops, coroutine, JSON utilities to build save system for high score.
➢ Created dynamic UI elements and engaging game mechanics to improve gameplay.

title: The Explorer
description:
➢ A 2D RPG game.
➢ Implemented gameplay mechanics, enemy AIs, character animations, audio system.
➢ also designed and created UI elements and 3 unique levels using tilemap tool.
➢ Used singleton, OOP for implementation.

title: Duck Hunt
description:
➢ Clone of classic Duck hunt game
➢ Utilized MVC, service locator pattern for smooth gameplay.
➢ Animated duck sprites with different flying patterns.
➢ Mouse-controlled aiming and shooting Score tracking.
➢ Sound effects for shooting and duck hits and Game over screen when the player misses too many ducks

title: Space Invaders
description:
➢ Implemented core mechanics like player controls, enemy movement and collision detection.
➢ Utilized MVC, service locator pattern, OOP principles, event handling, and optimized performance for smooth gameplay.
➢ Integrated graphics, animations, and sound effects to enhance the user experience.
